title: palmed_off.avi
description:
Palmed Off is a 20 minute film. It is based on community testimonies and covers the impacts of oil palm plantations on Indigenous peoples in Indonesia. Palmed Off comes as 6 chapters: Introduction, Local economics, Water, Culture, Land and Conflict and finally Moving Forward.

3 NGO&#039;s - Friends of the Earth, Sawit Watch and LifeMosaic have been working together on palm oil campaigns since 2006.

Also available on You Tube in 6 parts:
